link.script:

img.aria-label: Distance learning information for grades Kindergarten through 8 during the COVID-19 closure.
Distance learning information for grades Kindergarten through 8 during the COVID-19 closure.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.strong: *April 13 - May 1 materials are posted in corresponding grade level pages.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.strong: Click on the menu to the left to access.*

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: The digital resources below are recommended resources for extending your child's learning.
The three here are quite comprehensive and span multiple grade levels and subjects.
The majority of these resources are accessible without an account however some will require the creation of accounts.

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/JqLoB9Vw7O9lsmj6jkJn3wBQSC600ZEb13cmMnGpFbRmF8gk5iPl4K-N_Tc28QgYqVYpYwI=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: VERY extensive list of free K-12 products offered by companies & organizations to support learning during extended school closures curated by ISTE and EdSurge.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Smithsonian compiled a plethora of resources by themes and topics that are most often taught at each grade level and organized these resources by grade band.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Navigate social distancing and school closures with quality media and at-home learning opportunities for your kids.

a.title: Open Document, NKCPS K-8 Digital Learning Resources

iframe.aria-label: Document, NKCPS K-8 Digital Learning Resources

div.aria-label: Document, NKCPS K-8 Digital Learning Resources
